name: Fire Rocket Lava Dungeon
description:
Fire your Rockets and Lava your Dungeons!

You have a fire rocket strapped to your back and with it you need to pass through the lava dungeon collecting coins as you go.
However! Every 10 seconds you dawdle a random selection of effects are compiled for your convenience, or inconvenience. But you must choose, and quickly. A life is the price of hesitancy.
WASD to move and SPACE to jump. Look with mouse.

Made In Collaboration with AllTooCrazy
Made for the Ludum Dare 51. - Theme: "Every 10 seconds"

Rate my game! @ https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/fire-rocket-lava-dungeon

Be sure to share your scores in the comments.
